Title: Any storage file can be downloaded from p.sh if full server path is known
Description: The default configuration for platform.sh (.platform.app.yaml) allows access to uploaded files if you know or can guess their location, regardless of whether roles grant content read access to the content containing those files. If you're using Legacy Bridge, the default configuration also allows access to certain legacy files that should not be readable, including the legacy var directory and extension directories.
AffectedVersions: All versions up to 1.13.6, all versions starting from 2.0.0 up to 2.5.24
NotImpacted: All versions after 1.13.6 before 2.0.0, all versions after 2.5.24
